mdRecord.dcterms:title: Santa Barbara Mission, exterior
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Lasuén, Fermín Francisco de (Spanish priest, 1736-1803) [work]
Wilson, Richard Guy [photographer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: General view, church facade and arcade

Mission established December 4, 1786. Three adobe churches constructed over time. Third church destroyed by earthquake in 1812; fourth and present church built in 1820. Fountain in front built 1808. Mission church and friary damaged in earthquake of June 29, 1925. Restoration work completed 1927; towers reinforced 1953. -- http://santabarbaramission.org/page/history [work]
